mods.title: Mario Size v1.0.1
mods.shortDescription: Mario Size lets you shrink or grow Mario on the fly, changing how he moves around!
mods.detailedDescription: Mario Size lets you shrink or grow Mario on the fly, changing how he moves around! Inspired by 'Fire Ball Mario's Moveset', this independent mod is perfect for speedruns, challenges, or just messing around. It functions as a neutral gameplay experience compatible with multiplayer. This version (v1.0.1) serves as the stable release with critical bug fixes for level entry freezes and optimized camera logic. Requires sm64coopdx v1.4 or above.
features: Shrink Mode: Hold Y to get smaller and walk faster
Grow Mode: Press Y twice (hold on 2nd) to get bigger and slower
Giant effects: Ground shakes with steps and added Bowser footstep sounds
Reset Size: Press X to instantly return to normal size
Multiplayer: Optimized camera shake and increased max size limit
Bug Fix: Added validation to prevent logic execution during cutscenes
mods.activation: Hold Y (Shrink) > Press Y twice & Hold (Grow) > Press X (Reset)

mods.title: RD Notify Message v1.0
mods.shortDescription: Notification System for SM64 Coop DX. Create custom visual notifications on screen to communicate with your friends.
mods.detailedDescription: Create custom visual notifications on screen to communicate with your friends during multiplayer. Perfect for announcing events, giving instructions, or just leaving funny messages. This host-only tool supports permanent alerts and timed messages ranging from 5 to 30 seconds. Features extensive customization including colors (basic, themed, rainbow), movement animations, and glow effects. Long messages auto-wrap and timed alerts fade out smoothly. Credit to Djoslin0 for Lib source.
features: Color Customization: /rdc [color] (Includes Mario Red, Luigi Green, Rainbow, etc.)
Visual Effects: Toggle movement (/rdn) and glow (/rdb)
Logic: Movement ON + Glow ON = Pulsing text; Movement OFF = Static text
mods.activation: Open Chat > Type /rdt [message] to start (Host only)

mods.title: Fire Ball Mario's Moveset v1.0
mods.shortDescription: Adds four new custom moves: Air Spin, Fire Tornado, Rocket Jump, and a shrinking Roll.
mods.detailedDescription: Fire Ball Mario's Moveset adds four powerful custom moves: Air Spin, Fire Tornado, Rocket Jump, and Roll. Use these unique abilities to engage in crazy battles with your friends. Features the 'Door Bust' ability, implemented with thanks to Agent X. Report any bugs or share ideas!
features: Air Spin: Press A in the air to spin mid-air with increasing speed and leave a fire trail.
Fire Tornado: Press Z + X (ground or air) for a fast spin that shoots fireballs and grows bigger by spamming X.
Rocket Jump: Press Z + Y to launch Mario high up like a rocket.
Roll: Press Z + B on the ground for fast movement; shrinks Mario down and continues to shrink by holding B.
Includes 'Door Bust' feature (thanks to Agent X)
mods.activation: See features list for specific move controls (e.g., Fire Tornado: Z + X)
